website_summaries.verdict: Quality ingredients in pre-brewed bottles make this a good choice for iced or room temperature tea drinkers on the go.
pros: Appreciated by tea lovers who don't have time to brew or don't like hot tea – this pack of 12 bottles includes top flavors: peach, honey green tea, and tea/lemonade
Brewed with organic, fair trade tea leaves
cons: Pre-sweetened, which may be a deal-breaker for those who prefer sugar-free tea or like to control the level of sweetness
Some reports from repeat users of an occasional bottle with a strange flavor

customer_reviews.title: Crap in a bottle
customer_reviews.text: .This is just disgusting tea with sediment and molded pieces of what looks like snot and mucous in the bottom. Gross! We will never buy again. Switched to Pure leaf. Which is Pepsi/Lipton owned. It’s clean and CLEAR. The tea is black tea and very flavorful! I buy peach and raspberry flavors! Yummy. Forget this other crap. And I do mean crap!
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Lackluster flavor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Pomegranate Blue Tea, and was not impressed with the flavor. Others in my household (four in total), also tried the tea, but unfortunately, nobody enjoyed it. I do believe this was a good value, as I’ve seen the price for this tea in stores. The packaging was good, and all bottles arrived un-damaged; the stars for those categories reflect as much. It really was just the flavor that was lacking. Overall I would not recommend this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: oneboyonegirl

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed flavor
customer_reviews.text: I was under the assumption that this was a pomegranate blueberry ice tea and all that you taste when you drink it is Grape juice. I would never have purchased this product if I had known that. It was very disappointing and unhappy about the flavor. Will never purchase again. If you don’t like grape juice don’t buy it. Will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Caffeine free for me!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tea without caffeine! This drink is best when it is chilled. The taste is fantastic. Yes, sugar content is higher than i would like but you are getting it naturally. No sucralose! Of course as I ALWAYS say about any review concerning food.....it is all in the individual's taste buds. For me this tea is my favorite of the Honest selection. The other choice is of course the Green tea without caffeine. But now that I can order it through Amazon, I am going to stock up on this flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce D.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes fine but not tea
customer_reviews.text: I like to order caf-free tea when I can and thought I'd try orange mango since it was advertised as tea, and I liked other teas I have ordered from Honest Tea. But I have had a number of herbal teas and I would say this is not one of them. It is more like a sweet juice tasting of orange and mango. A good taste, but not tea. More of a fruit juice blend. Also, I am not happy that the exp date is two weeks from when I received the item.
customer_reviews.author: Bmat

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and not too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I really like honest teas because not only are they organic, but they also are never very sweet. I really like that. We let our son drink more of these then the other really sweet teas. They seem to be bringing out more flavors. Unless we just don't get the random ones where we live. I've never seen this mango flavor and I'm glad i got it cause it tastes really good.
customer_reviews.author: Manny23

customer_reviews.title: Too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I used to drink the original version all the time. They must have changed the formula when they made the organic version because it’s super sweet and gross. I am unsure what to do with the entire case In my fridge. I considered throwing it out but felt guilty. Can’t donate it now that I’ve refrigerated it. Save yourself the hassle and order something else.
customer_reviews.author: happy_hal

customer_reviews.title: Too much sugar--honest!
customer_reviews.text: Previously, I reviewed Honest tea with a 5 star rating because of the exceptional taste. I believed the hype about it being a healthy product--not so; not only does it have honey, but it is loaded with sugar. If you like weight gain, elevated blood sugar, and tooth decay, this is the beverage for you!
customer_reviews.author: L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Check the “best by” date on your product!
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered to my home in December 2018. I didn’t know it had a shelf life of one month. Someone asked me today (9-9-2019) where I got my tea and pointed out that the “best by” date printed in the plastic bottle was January 2019. Yikes! It tasted and looked okay but I know have an almost full case of “expired” tea. (And check the sugar content)
customer_reviews.author: alison859

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite drinks. I can drink it everyday but I ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite drinks. I can drink it everyday but I shouldn't. I am sure that will give me cavities... Lol Most drinks out there is too sweet for me. This is perfect. I like the taste and the different flavors they come in. I did a Amazon subscription so its a lot cheaper than buying in the stores. Another benefit is I do not need to lug these in the stores. It can be heavy. A win win for me. Save money(cheaper product, gas) and save on time. Perfect Amazon! You rock!
customer_reviews.author: PeanutButter

customer_reviews.title: I enjoy this tea
customer_reviews.text: I always order the variety pack because it's the most affordable. For $12.00, I get 4 bottles of peach tea, lemon tea and homey green tea. However I buy mine from amazon and its not always in stock. The other parties sell this for a much higher price... so I would keep checking the price. I enjoy this tea. It's not too sweet like other teas. Its very light and refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Pubic hair

customer_reviews.title: MAILING EXPIRED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Every Month we are getting either expired or close to expired product. The tea taste great but i do not want old product. It turns cloudy and Amazon should not be used to get rid of old product. Send old product to big lots or donate it. I am paying retail price i want fresh product that is not expired.
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tasting Green tea !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Honest Tea Honey and Green Tea because it doesn't contain much sweetener at all. Normally, I'm a purist -- no sugar, no artificial sweeteners in my tea -- but this Honest Tea has enough honey to give the tea some complexity without seeing, well, sweet. At 70 calories per 16.9 fl. oz. bottle, it's a relatively low calorie drink with some flavor.
customer_reviews.author: kushp576

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for the cranberry lemon flavor
customer_reviews.text: I’m a big fan of Honest’s iced tea beverages in general but the cranberry lemon flavor is revolting, and doesn’t even list actual tea among its ingredients. It’s harsh, bordering on chemical—very unlike their other varieties.
customer_reviews.author: Ajax

customer_reviews.title: barely sweet real tasty
customer_reviews.text: can't find this local and the price is good. I subscribed. Can you imagine, an ice tea subscription?
customer_reviews.author: Carshare.TV

customer_reviews.title: Honest Tea is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: This is one of many flavors that I enjoy. The sole complaint about the product has nothing to do with the seller and is somewhat trivial. I find that the product is overfilled in most cases. As a result, when I open the cap, it spills. A teaspoon less product will save a spill.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart B

customer_reviews.title: Meh...
customer_reviews.text: Many of the reviews of this product state that it's too sweet; to me, it's not sweet enough. I improved it by adding a bit of sugar to the half&half and the peach, and adding a little honey to the honey green - this made the tea OK but not good and I won't buy it again. It's probably my personal taste - I'm not afraid of sugar - but this may help others who like their tea on the somewhat sweet side.
customer_reviews.author: Mixalis

customer_reviews.title: I Love this Drink!
customer_reviews.text: I used to be able to buy this at the grocery store but for some reason they stopped selling it. I was really glad to find it here on Amazon! This flavor is perfect for me...and just a tad sweet. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Northland

customer_reviews.title: Favorite  Caffeine Free Tea
customer_reviews.text: Love the orange mango flavor. Great not having to worry about caffeine. A good thirst quencher with less sugar. Seller provides prompt delivery and protective packaging. Will continue reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Carol G.

customer_reviews.title: Weaker tea and mango flavoring than expected, but still good
customer_reviews.text: I'm the type of person who like their tea strong. This tea did not offer that and the mango flavoring was to weak for my liking. Despite all of that, the drink was still very refreshing and a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jr

customer_reviews.title: Love it, love it, LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Love these and all they stand for. A great company with a great cause. All the flavors taste amazing and unique. I recommend everyone trying these!
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, but look before you drink...
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I drink this all the time. It's very delicious and has a decent amount of flavor (compared to their teas). So why knock a star? You'll see in the image attached, but my wife shook the bottle (as we normally do) and there was this stuff floating in it...it looked like mold. So unfortunately, I have to advise people to look in the bottle before swigging this delicious drink, just to be sure you don't have the same thing happen to you...
customer_reviews.author: SeaLight

customer_reviews.title: Love the Tea!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this tea from amazon as they are the few who have this item. The tea itself is great in my opinion. I give it a 3 star only because when I received the item form Amazon it had expired a month prior to delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: I don't love the green tea or the half tea half lemonade ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality ingredients. This brand seems to have more dregs than other bottled teas but not really an issue at least for me. I don't love the green tea or the half tea half lemonade so I will not be reordering this pack.
customer_reviews.author: Scott O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Pricey
customer_reviews.text: Don't quite taste any ginger but a great peach iced tea. Too bad it's so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: D. A. Norton

customer_reviews.title: I'm vertically challenged and the market seemed to stock on the top shelf and never restock so they can be easily reached. Now I don't have that problem and ...
customer_reviews.text: Was buying these in the market until they no longer had the flavor, besides, I'm vertically challenged and the market seemed to stock on the top shelf and never restock so they can be easily reached. Now I don't have that problem and get what I want!!
customer_reviews.author: Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy the Honest Tea drinks. I prefer the regular Orange Mango HT flavor but the Blood Orange is tasty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I like Honest Tea and this gives me a non caffeinated version for evening. Tastes great. Ordered it multiple times.
customer_reviews.author: ramsau

customer_reviews.title: Air Force man likes this drinks
customer_reviews.text: My son who currently serving the military said he loves organic drinks and likes iced tea so I bought him this one and sent it there and he said he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: SmartBuyer97

customer_reviews.title: Happy Honest Family
customer_reviews.text: My family likes this drink, but it's hard to find in stores in our area. We were happy to find it and have it delivered right to our door. Good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Janet J.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I want more!!!! At the moment there isn’t any more to order. Next time there is... we will order a TON!
customer_reviews.author: John & Manuela

customer_reviews.title: Try it, you may like it
customer_reviews.text: Flavor is weak but sugar content is as described...not overwhelming. Let's just sayqq, flavor-wise, it aint Snapple.
customer_reviews.author: Truvvy

customer_reviews.title: Simple and delicious
customer_reviews.text: The peach flavor is more distinct than the ginger aspect to me, but nevertheless I enjoy this beverage.
customer_reviews.author: C. Smitley

customer_reviews.title: Great price!
customer_reviews.text: My family loves this tea. It has a nice light flavor. My kids love the level of sweetness since most teas are over sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Chelfocrom

customer_reviews.title: Hooked for life
customer_reviews.text: Visiting Disney World a few summers ago I got hooked. I’m not big on sweet drinks, and this is not sweet. It has just enough sweetness to make it great!
customer_reviews.author: inxs4

customer_reviews.title: My favorite flavor or Honest teas.
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Honest Tea fan and although water is best, this tea doesn’t have as much sugar are soda. It’s not too sweet but just right.
customer_reviews.author: Nosieray

customer_reviews.title: My husband's favorite
customer_reviews.text: I only wish that the individual bottles were larger, like half gallon.
customer_reviews.author: Knerq

customer_reviews.title: Excellent variety tea
customer_reviews.text: The variety tea is very good. You get peach, half lemon and tea and green tea with honey.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Many bottles filled with tea leaf "dregs"
customer_reviews.text: Love the taste...but after getting 3 separate 12 packs, I have found that about 1/4 to 1/3 of the bottles have LOTS of floating tea leaf bits in them. So, if you like big doses of "tea dregs", then this is the tea for you. But, I don't, so I am canceling my subscribe and save subscription for this tea. Note: I also tried a 12 pack of their tea and lemon flavor...same result, about 1/4 of the bottles had lots of tea leaves in them. So, they have some kind of quality control problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Need to add more of the advertised flavor!!
customer_reviews.text: The tea taste is too strong and can’t taste the flavor mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: jmthiessenrn

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor
customer_reviews.text: My daughter discovered this tea at Wendy's. She loved it. I had to do a little searching, but finally found it. They taste good and they are good for you. They were also delivered quickly
customer_reviews.author: L Pages

customer_reviews.title: Organic tea
customer_reviews.text: Great taste and something light to drink when it’s hot outside. Even my husband liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Bills

customer_reviews.title: Came as described
customer_reviews.text: I got an amazin deal on these and bought 3 cases but wish I got more
customer_reviews.author: mande

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Very good stuff for people that rather have their teas slightly sweetened. Peach flavor by far my favorite. Too bad i can no longer just get that. You have to buy the variety pack
customer_reviews.author: Costa

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: My family loves these, we all have them with dinners.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Salvaggio

customer_reviews.title: Favorite flavor of the Honest Teas
customer_reviews.text: Love honest teas, orange mango, half tea lemonade and the pomegranate!
customer_reviews.author: Mark e Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent - but watch out for pricing
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Should only cost $14-16 dollars though, not $19.99
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Not too sweet
customer_reviews.text: I lived in Japan for many years where bottled teas are more common than soft drinks. Finding a great tea that is not too sweet and can be consumed almost daily is a challenge. I love the taste of HONEST Teas, with subtle sweetness and refreshing taste. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Palsboss

customer_reviews.title: Watered down-do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I drink these from work and decided to buy a whole package and the only place I could find this flavor was Amazon.com. Well, even though it’s the same brand and flavor, these are completely different. They are watered down and have almost no ice tea flavor. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: A.M.B.

customer_reviews.title: The green tea and the tea/lemonade options are excellent. The peach tea is way too sweet for ...
customer_reviews.text: The green tea and the tea/lemonade options are excellent. The peach tea is way too sweet for me, regardless of the amount of sugar added. It must be an acquired taste. Gave it away to a neighbour.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Great taste!
customer_reviews.text: I have not drunk it for two years. I read some comments indicating that the taste and quality are worse than they were before. I have not noticed any difference. I think it is still great! I found cheaper ones at a grocery store in North Carolina.
customer_reviews.author: A. Oguz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this tea..!! Great flavor with no sugar..!!! Will definitely keep purchasing
customer_reviews.author: A. Golding

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I'm so obsessed w this product. My very first taste I thought it was weird but now I just can't get enough especially the peach. I want them all. Give em to me. Thirst quenched indeed! Like seriously obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Symone

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Honest Tea's line of the Iced Tea/Lemonade mix, the Green Tea and White Peach Tea assortment so much. I could not believe my luck to have found it available by the case AND get it routinely shipped yo my house through smile.amazon.com! And bonus: Amazon even let me choose which charity to donate to. I get the best of all three!! I only wish everything in life could run this smoothly. Thanks Honest Tea & Amazon!!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Birney

customer_reviews.title: Honest tea
customer_reviews.text: Ordered only when on sale. Really prefer the half n half, green tea is good but a little weak, peach is ok, I ususally don't like anything peach
customer_reviews.author: Matt Matt

customer_reviews.title: Honest Tea really!
customer_reviews.text: These teas taste as advertised- not too sweet yet flavorful.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor oh so good
customer_reviews.text: Started drinking these daily and life become a little more exciting. I love love love the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would like a refund or a better product.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how long these have been sitting..But they taste horrible, like they’ve been sitting for a long time, plus it shouldn’t have this black residue at the bottom. Gross!
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Great drink
customer_reviews.text: Love this light citrus drink. Just the trick to quench thirst
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Merryman

customer_reviews.title: Delivered quick as I was told it would be
customer_reviews.text: I give this 5 stars because it is what it is advertised to be. However, I learned I'm not a green tea lover.

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite drink on the planet, it’s amazing

customer_reviews.text: I love Honest Tea. Just a small amount of sweet that doesn’t cancel out the delicious tea itself.

customer_reviews.title: Love the selection
customer_reviews.text: Love the selection. The flavors are pretty good if you like tea, on the drier side of most teas I drink but still good.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: I love the flavor of this tea. I order it regularly.

customer_reviews.title: Shipping problem?
customer_reviews.text: My product was smashed when I got it. The worst part? The box was fine which means someone actually thought it was ok to ship this Too bad because this is my favorite iced tea!

customer_reviews.title: Does not taste like it should.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know what I got but it wasn’t the tea I was expecting. All three flavors looked & tasted the same. The green tea I normally buy in the store is a light colored tea but this one was dark. They all tasted like they were watered down.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Keller

customer_reviews.title: Able to get the honest tea
customer_reviews.text: My husband & grandchildren enjoy the Honest Tea pomegranate blue, it has gotten harder to find. I ordered a case & it was at my door within a short time.

customer_reviews.title: Barely sweet

customer_reviews.text: Good drink, but lacks the tart lemon taste that I was looking for. At least it's not loaded with sugar.

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a flavor favor!

product_meta.title: Honest tea Organic Fair Trade Brewed Tea Variety Pack (Peach, Honey Green, Half & Half), 16.9 fl oz (12 Pack)
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Brewed Organic Tea Variety PackExperience the difference of real-brewed iced tea with Honest Tea organic bottled teas . Enjoy Honest Tea organic bottled teas’ most popular flavors of bottled tea in this variety pack featuring three favorite varieties: Honest Peach Tea, Honest Honey Green Tea, and Honest Half Tea and Half Lemonade. Add a refreshing drink to your day with USDA Organic certified iced tea. All of the Honest Tea organic iced tea beverages are real-brewed with Fair Trade Certified tea leaves, gluten-free, OU-Kosher certified, non-GMO, and free of high-fructose corn syrup. No GMOs means that if there is a bioengineered version of an ingredient, we don’t use it. Pick your choice of three organic bottled iced teas: Honest Half and Half, Honest Honey Green Tea, and Honest Peach Tea. This organic ice tea assortment ships in a pack of 12 16.9-fluid ounce recyclable plastic bottles.
